alert.note: Alert for Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 02 at 4:01AM EST until January 02 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Northern Franklin, Northern St. Lawrence and Western Clinton Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will be moderate to heavy at times through the day before quickly ending by evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow plenty of extra time if travel is necessary late tonight into Sunday.

area.areaDesc: Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton
